message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Could you consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet halfway at $16,000?
I understand your perspective, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $14,000?
